import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; function SpentPerDay() { const spent = [useSelector((state) => state.moneySpent.value)]; let reduxProcess = spent .toString() .split(",") .map((str) => { //process redux data return Number(str); }); const b = 24; //available heights: 0, 2, 4, 6, 8, 9, 12, 16, 20, 24 const c = "w-6 bg-terracotta-500 rounded-sm hover:bg-neptune-500 h-" + b; //test height variable return (
mon
tue
wed
thur
fri
sat
sun
); } export default SpentPerDay;
